targets.query:
from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "system")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "uptime")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host =~ /^${server:regex}/)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: true)

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "cpu_temperature")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host =~ /^${server:regex}/)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: true)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: float(v: r._value) / 1000.0 }))

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "system")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "load5")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host =~ /^${server:regex}/)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: true)

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "processes")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "zombies")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host =~ /^${server:regex}/)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: true)

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "processes")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "total")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host =~ /^${server:regex}/)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: true)

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "processes")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "total_threads")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host =~ /^${server:regex}/)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: true)

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "cpu")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "usage_idle")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host =~ /^${server:regex}/ and r.cpu == "cpu-total")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: true)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: (float(v: r._value) * -1.0) + 100.0 }))

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "mem")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "used_percent")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host =~ /^${server:regex}/)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: true)

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "swap")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "used_percent")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host =~ /^${server:regex}/)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: true)

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "disk")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "used_percent")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host =~ /^${server:regex}/ and r.path == "/")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: true)

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "cpu")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "usage_iowait")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host =~ /^${server:regex}/ and r.cpu == "cpu-total")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: true)
  |> derivative(unit: 1s, nonNegative: true)

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "cpu")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host =~ /^${server:regex}/ and r.cpu == "cpu-total")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r._field, set: [
        "usage_user", 
        "usage_system", 
        "usage_softirq", 
        "usage_steal", 
        "usage_nice", 
        "usage_irq", 
        "usage_iowait", 
        "usage_guest", 
        "usage_guest_nice"
    ]))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: true)
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> rename(columns: {
        usage_user: "user",
        usage_system: "system",
        usage_softirq: "softirq",
        usage_steal: "steal",
        usage_nice: "nice",
        usage_irq: "irq",
        usage_iowait: "iowait",
        usage_guest: "guest",
        usage_guest_nice: "guest_nice"
    })

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "mem")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host =~ /^${server:regex}/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r._field, set: [
        "total", 
        "used", 
        "cached", 
        "free", 
        "buffered"
    ]))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: true)
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"], desc: false)
  |> rename(columns: {
        total: "total",
        used: "used",
        cached: "cached",
        free: "free",
        buffered: "buffered"
    })

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "processes")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host =~ /^${server:regex}/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r._field, set: [
        "running", 
        "blocked", 
        "sleeping", 
        "stopped", 
        "zombies", 
        "paging", 
        "unknown"
    ]))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: true)
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"], desc: false)
  |> rename(columns: {
        running: "running",
        blocked: "blocked",
        sleeping: "sleeping",
        stopped: "stopped",
        zombies: "zombies",
        paging: "paging",
        unknown: "unknown"
    })

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "system")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host =~ /^${server:regex}/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r._field, set: [
        "load1", 
        "load5", 
        "load15"
    ]))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: true)
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"], desc: false)
  |> rename(columns: {
        load1: "short",
        load5: "medium",
        load15: "long"
    })

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "kernel")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host =~ /^${server:regex}/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "context_switches")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: true)
  |> derivative(unit: 1s, nonNegative: true)
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"], desc: false)
  |> rename(columns: { _value: "context switches" })

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "kernel")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "processes_forked")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host =~ /^${server:regex}/)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: true)
  |> derivative(unit: 1s, nonNegative: true)
  |> rename(columns: { _value: "forks" })

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "net")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "bytes_recv")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host =~ /^${server:regex}/ and r.interface =~ /^${netif:regex}/)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> derivative(unit: 1s, nonNegative: true)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: r._value * 8.0 }))
  |> rename(columns: { _value: "in" })

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "net")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "bytes_sent")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host =~ /^${server:regex}/ and r.interface =~ /^${netif:regex}/)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> derivative(unit: 1s, nonNegative: true)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: r._value * 8.0 }))
  |> rename(columns: { _value: "out" })

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "net")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "packets_recv")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host =~ /^${server:regex}/ and r.interface =~ /^${netif:regex}/)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> derivative(unit: 1s, nonNegative: true)
  |> rename(columns: { _value: "in" })

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "net")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "packets_sent")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host =~ /^${server:regex}/ and r.interface =~ /^${netif:regex}/)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> derivative(unit: 1s, nonNegative: true)
  |> rename(columns: { _value: "out" })

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "net")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "drop_in")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host =~ /^${server:regex}/ and r.interface =~ /^${netif:regex}/)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> derivative(unit: 1s, nonNegative: true)
  |> rename(columns: { _value: "in" })

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "net")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "drop_out")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host =~ /^${server:regex}/ and r.interface =~ /^${netif:regex}/)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> derivative(unit: 1s, nonNegative: true)
  |> rename(columns: { _value: "out" })

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "net")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "err_in")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host =~ /^${server:regex}/ and r.interface =~ /^${netif:regex}/)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> derivative(unit: 1s, nonNegative: true)
  |> rename(columns: { _value: "in" })

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "net")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "err_out")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host =~ /^${server:regex}/ and r.interface =~ /^${netif:regex}/)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> derivative(unit: 1s, nonNegative: true)
  |> rename(columns: { _value: "out" })

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "swap")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host =~ /^${server:regex}/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r._field, set: ["in", "out"]))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> derivative(unit: 1s, nonNegative: true)
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"], desc: false)
  |> rename(columns: {
        in: "in",
        out: "out"
    })

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "swap")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host =~ /^${server:regex}/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r._field, set: ["used", "total"]))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"], desc: false)
  |> rename(columns: {
        used: "used",
        total: "total"
    })

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "diskio")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "reads")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host =~ /^${server:regex}/ and r.name =~ /^${disk:regex}/)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> derivative(unit: 1s, nonNegative: true)
  |> rename(columns: { _value: "read" })

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "diskio")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "writes")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host =~ /^${server:regex}/ and r.name =~ /^${disk:regex}/)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> derivative(unit: 1s, nonNegative: true)
  |> rename(columns: { _value: "write" })

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "diskio")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "read_bytes")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host =~ /^${server:regex}/ and r.name =~ /^${disk:regex}/)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> derivative(unit: 1s, nonNegative: true)
  |> rename(columns: { _value: "read" })

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "diskio")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "write_bytes")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host =~ /^${server:regex}/ and r.name =~ /^${disk:regex}/)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> derivative(unit: 1s, nonNegative: true)
  |> rename(columns: { _value: "write" })

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "diskio")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "read_time")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host =~ /^${server:regex}/ and r.name =~ /^${disk:regex}/)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> derivative(unit: 1s, nonNegative: true)
  |> rename(columns: { _value: "read" })

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "diskio")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "write_time")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host =~ /^${server:regex}/ and r.name =~ /^${disk:regex}/)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> derivative(unit: 1s, nonNegative: true)
  |> rename(columns: { _value: "write" })

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "disk")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host =~ /^${server:regex}/ and r.path =~ /^${mountpoint:regex}/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r._field, set: ["total", "used"]))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> rename(columns: {
        total: "total",
        used: "used"
    })

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "disk")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host =~ /^${server:regex}/ and r.path =~ /^${mountpoint:regex}/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "inodes_used")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> rename(columns: { _value: "used" })

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "disk")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host =~ /^${server:regex}/ and r.path =~ /^${mountpoint:regex}/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r._field, set: ["inodes_free", "inodes_used"]))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with total: r.inodes_free + r.inodes_used }))
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "host", "path", "total"])

list.definition:
from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "system")
  |> keep(columns: ["host"])
  |> distinct(column: "host")
list.label: Server
list.name: server

query.query:
from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "system")
  |> keep(columns: ["host"])
  |> distinct(column: "host")

list.definition:

  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "disk")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host =~ /${server:regex}/)
  |> keep(columns: ["path"])
  |> distinct(column: "path")
list.label: Mountpoint

  |> distinct(column: "path")

  |> keep(columns: ["cpu"])

  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host =~ /^${server:regex}/)
  |> keep(columns: ["name"])

  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host =~ /^${server:regex}/)

list.definition:
from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "net")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host =~ /^${server:regex}/)
  |> keep(columns: ["interface"])
  |> distinct(column: "interface")
list.label: Network interface
list.name: netif

query.query:
from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "net")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host =~ /^${server:regex}/)
